CustomField.description: Renewal uplift amount calculated based on ((Initial Default Price ARR+Cumulative Indexation amount+Upcoming Indexation amount)*Price Uplift On Renewal %) which is added to sales price of the products.
CustomField.formula:
IF(Pricing_Factors_Applied__c && ISPICKVAL(Price_Uplift_On_Renewal__c,'Yes'), /* -- Initial Default Price ARR will be 0 in few closed opps as the initial default price is not updated on OLI's, in that case Original Renewal ARR is used for calculation -- */
(IF(Initial_Default_Price_ARR__c =0, Original_Renewal_ARR__c ,Initial_Default_Price_ARR__c) + Cumulative_Indexation_amount__c + Upcoming_Indexation_amount__c)* Price_Uplift_on_Renewal_percentage__c, 0 )
CustomField.label: Renewal Uplift amount
